revised_title: Exploration of the Solar Spectrum and its Lines
tldr: This article discusses the exploration of the solar spectrum and its lines by examining the work of Sir David Brewster and Dr. J.H. Gladstone. They analyzed the solar spectrum using various methods and scales, identifying over 2000 visible lines and features. The article also compares their work with previous research by Fraunhofer, Becquerel, and Stokes, highlighting the differences in their findings and methods.
